subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Editing EVP
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi LC,

> There will always be skeptics and critics, but one thing seems
> certain: everyone has their own time when they become open to the 
> possibility of the paranormal/spiritual existing.  I just choose to 
> share with those whose time has come.  :)

I wouldn't see an skeptical/critical attitude as something negative.
Some people just aren't "believers", their intellect wants to be
satisfied, too. :)

So being skeptical/critical doesn't necessarily mean not being a
"seeker".

Stefan
